item.title: Ticket #434 (<?php next_posts_link() ?> is missing from default template) created
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description:
There's no link to "previous/next page" in the default templates in WP.

This makes the 'view paged posts' feature a bit useless :-) Can we put it in please?

item.title: Ticket #432 (Daylight Savings Time) created
item.dc:creator: dennis
item.description:
WordPress apparently ignores the TZ environment variable so:

putenv('TZ=CST6CDT');

in wp-config.php only shows GMT (UTC) with a fixed offset time and doesn't move with daylight savings time on a server in a time zone that doesn't do DST and the author does.

The PHP date() function does follow the TZ daylight savings time.

item.title: Ticket #52 (category & excludecategory arguments to get_posts() non-functional) updated
item.dc:creator: jmoses
item.description: curious as to why this hasn't been copied into the wp source. it seems as if it's functional.
